code: import{API_URL}from"../utils/constants";export const wordHelperFetch=async word=>{try{const options={method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({word:word})};const response=await fetch(`${API_URL}/word_helper`,options);const data=await response.json();return data;}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);}};
